member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains information for one or more regions.

member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT.Version
member.summary: The size of this structure serves as the version. Set it to sizeof(FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT).

member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT.Alignment
member.summary: Offset from the beginning of the volume to the first slab of the tiered volume. If the logical disk is made up of multiple tiers and each tier maps to a set of regions then the first tier for the volume contained on the logical disk has a certain offset within the tier that represents the offset of the volume on the logical disk. The Alignment member contains this value.

member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT.NumberOfRegionsReturned
member.summary: Number of regions that fit in the output.

member.name: FSCTL_QUERY_REGION_INFO_OUTPUT.Regions
member.summary: struct that contains detailed information for each region.
